item.title: EP 45 - Purple Rain
item.itunes:title: Purple Rain
item.description:
Today we read a book that it's publication history is as fascinating as the stories inside, and try to unravel the mystery behind jelly-like piles found in locations around the world.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

"The Black Book Of Soviet Jewry" was an investigative account of German atrocities during World War 2. The idea was the Soviet Union wanted to know what had happened in German occupied territory but when the first accounts started being complied, the Soviets decided they didn't want to publish the book . . .and began to purge the authors.

Next up we visit an Arizona desert to look at a slimy lump sitting in the sand. What are they? Where did they come from? And are all reporters in Arizona as hot as that anchor?

Links:

The Black Book Of Soviet Jewry

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Black_Book_of_Soviet_Jewry

The Black Book

https://www.commentarymagazine.com/articles/the-black-book/

Hot reporter

http://realunexplainedmysteries.com/purple-spheres-of-the-arizona-desert

Thousands of Mysterious Purple Spheres Discovered in the Desert

http://weekinweird.com/2013/01/31/thousands-mysterious-purple-spheres-discovered-desert/

Mystery Of The Purple Spheres

https://visitcryptoville.com/2013/02/02/mystery-of-the-purple-spheres/

Blue balls mystery close to being solved

https://www.theguardian.com/uk/2012/jan/31/blue-balls-mystery-close-solved

Debunked?

https://www.metabunk.org/debunked-strange-blue-spheres-fall-over-england-2012.t411/

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
